solidDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as solid. Assign false: otherwise.

cribriformDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as cribriform. Assign false: otherwise.

micropapillaryDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as micropapillary. Assign false: otherwise.

papillaryDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as papillary. Assign false: otherwise.

apocrineDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as apocrine. Assign false: otherwise.

flatDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as flat. Assign false: otherwise.

comedoDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as comedo. Assign false: otherwise.

clingingDCISGP.description: Determine if ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) growth patterns (architecture) are described in the report. Assign true: if the DCIS growth pattern is described as clinging. Assign false: otherwise.

comedonecrosisExtent.description: Determine if the the report contains information on comedo necrosis in ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS).
enumDescriptions: Assign 'Y': if the report specifies that comedo necrosis is present in DCIS but the extent is not specified.
Assign 'N': if the report explicitly specifies that comedo necrosis is not present in DCIS.
Assign 'Mil': if the report specifies that comedo necrosis is present in DCIS and the extent is mild.
Assign 'Mod': if the report specifies that comedo necrosis is present in DCIS and the extent is moderate.
Assign 'Mar': if the report specifies that comedo necrosis is present in DCIS and the extent is marked.
Assign null: if the report does not contain information on comedo necrosis in DCIS.
